description: Per capita dollars for each county's expenditures towards general government, public safety, public works, health and social services, education and libraries, parks and recreation, and debt service. Source: Local Government Finances Fiscal 2010 (Department of Legislative Services), via Overview of Maryland Local Governments Finances and Demographic Information (Department of Legislative Services, 2012. Link: http://mgaleg.maryland.gov/pubs/budgetfiscal/2012-local-government-finances-demographics.pdf)
